channel.title: Hugo on CLog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on CLog

item.title: My first Blog
item.description: Đây là blog đầu tiên của tôi. Cảm ơn Hugo và theme PaperMod. OMG I don’t know why I couldn’t write my language - Vietnamese using Visual Studio Code. I will fix soon. Sorry if my English is not good but I do my best and ofcourse ChatGPT :)), thanks. Why is Blog? I created this blog and started writing because I want to share what I learn by myself and from my university, PTIT.
